The Trump administration is tossing out a Biden-era approach on the export of semiconductors used in artificial intelligence . Scrapping the AI diffusion framework won't change the measures targeting China . Instead, it would provide fresh opportunities for other countries to negotiate their own chip access . The AI diffusion rule, unveiled during Biden’s final week in office, expanded those licensing requirements to most of the world .
